```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("nyc_airbnb")

nyc_airbnb = 
  nyc_airbnb |> 
  select(
    neighbourhood_group, neighbourhood, price, room_type, lat, long) |>
  filter(
    !is.na(rating), 
    neighbourhood_group == "Manhattan",
    room_type == "Entire home/apt",
    price %in% 100:500)
```
